page.title: 08BASILDON NE: LOCAL SURVEY
page.content: Children from a local school asked their parents what they liked least about Basildon. The ten most common answers were: 1. Litter. Left as much by adults as by children, paper and old mattresses are untidy, but broken glass and the like are a danger. 2. Overcrowding. Houses are too close together, and there are too few to house the second generation families. 3. Expensive inner town travel and poor and unreliable bus service. 4. Vandalism. 5. High crime rate. 6. High unemployment. 7. The layout of the housing. 8. High rates. 9. High car parking fees. 10. Basildon's bad reputation, in that it appears a town of problems.
